name: SAVIOR (itch) (ricjj777)
description:
My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 Submission by ricjj777

For the Source Code, download: SAVIOR_Source_Windows_Ver.zip

You are a young man with the divine gift of healing and a zombie apocalypse is going on.

Press 'Space' to heal the injured people. If you heal undead enemies, they'll take damage. Move with the WASD or Arrow keys.

Open Game Art free assets (sprites, sound and music)

ArMM1998, Buch, Mopz, Proxy Games, Reemax
